article_title: Can capitalism it survive without labor?
article_text:
Kankakee, IL (60901)

Today

Variable clouds with scattered showers and thunderstorms, mainly during the afternoon hours. High 84F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%..

Tonight

A widely scattered shower or thunderstorm is possible this evening. Then cloudy skies overnight. Low 67F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

og.description: Ken: Democratic candidate Bernie Sanders recently visited the Vatican, met the pope and delivered a few words at a Vatican conference on the world economy. He is quoted by the
